尺橈骨幹雙骨折: double fracture of shafts of ulna and radius

食品藥物管理局現代化法案: Food and Drug Administration Modernization Act {=FDAMA}

門控心臟血池平衡閃爍造影: gated equilibrium cardiac blood pool scintigraphy

腱鞘巨細胞瘤: giant cell tumor of tendon sheath {=GCTTS}

國際放射線單位及測定委員會: international commission on radiation units and measurements {=ICRU}

MELAS症候群 {粒線體異常引發之肌肉病變、腦病變、乳酸中毒、中風症候群}: MELAS {mitochondrial myopathy, encephalopathy, lactic acidosis, strokes syndrome}

MERRF症候群 {肌抽躍癲癇合併紅色襤褸肌纖維症}: MERRF {Myoclonic Epilepsy with Ragged Red Fibers}

美國輻射防護與度量委員會: National Council on Radiation Protection and Measurement {=NCRP}

美國醫學物理學會: The American Association of Physicists in Medicine (AAPM)

腦室腹腔分流通暢檢查: ventricular peritoneal shunt {=VP shunt} patency study
